notes: Detail across rows may not add to total because of rounding. Detail across columns have been adjusted to add to total. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and Census Bureau, 2023 Annual Business Survey: Data Year 2022.
